headline: RTX Contract Brings Thin Film Lithium Niobate Supply Chain Closer To Home
summary: Raytheon, a business of RTX (NYSE:RTX), has been awarded a contract to establish domestic production of thin film lithium niobate wafers in the U.S. The wafers support secure defense communications, advanced sensing, and commercial photonics applications. The effort is being carried out in collaboration with G&H to reduce reliance on foreign suppliers for this critical material. For RTX, known for its defense, aerospace, and communications technology, this move sits at the intersection of...

headline: RTX's Pratt & Whitney broadens manufacturing capabilities with $200 million investment in Columbus, Georgia
summary: Pratt & Whitney, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, is investing $200 million to expand the capabilities and footprint of its Columbus, Georgia, operations, which support commercial and military engine programs. With this new investment, Pratt & Whitney is adding a seventh isothermal forging press at its Columbus Forge facility. This addition is expected to increase output of critical parts, such as rotating compressor and turbine disks, by 30% to support GTF, F135 and other engine programs. The isoth

headline: RTX Corporation (RTX) Gets Complete Approval for StormBreaker Smart Weapon
summary: RTX Corporation (NYSE:RTX) is one of the Best Aerospace and Defense Stocks to Invest In Right Now.
